table_description: Files uploaded to OpenAI for fine-tuning.

columns.name: id
columns.description: ID of the file, e.g. davinci.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp of when the file was created.

columns.name: bytes
columns.description: Size of the file in bytes

columns.name: object
columns.description: The type of the uploaded document, e.g. file.

columns.name: purpose
columns.description: The intended purpose of the uploaded documents.
